Package arcade.patch.env.operation

Class PatchOperationDiffuserTri

  • java.lang.Object
    • arcade.patch.env.operation.PatchOperation
      • arcade.patch.env.operation.PatchOperationDiffuser
        • arcade.patch.env.operation.PatchOperationDiffuserTri
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Operation
    public class PatchOperationDiffuserTri
extends PatchOperationDiffuser
    Extension of PatchOperationDiffuser for triangular lattices.

    Operation also check if the triangle is pointed up or down based on the row and column, where the top left of the 2D array at coordinate (0,0) is a triangle pointing down.

    • Constructor Detail

      • PatchOperationDiffuserTri

        public PatchOperationDiffuserTri​(PatchLattice lattice,
                                 double ds,
                                 double dz)
        Creates a PatchOperationDiffuser for triangular lattices.

        Constructor calculates rate and multipliers for diffusion on the triangular lattice given diffusivity of the molecule. If the finite different approximation is not stable, the multipliers are adjusted to use a pseudo-steady state approximation.

        The constructor also initializes an orientation lattice indicating which direction the triangles are facing.

        Parameters:
        lattice - the PatchLattice the operation is associated with
        ds - the spatial scaling (x and y directions)
        dz - the spatial scaling (z direction)
